TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit CaseInsensitiveComparison extends System.Object
public ref class CaseInsensitiveComparison abstract sealed

Docs.summary: Case-insensitive operations (mostly comparison) on unicode strings.

MemberSignature.Value: public static int Compare (string left, string right);
.method public static hidebysig int32 Compare(string left, string right) cil managed
Public Shared Function Compare (left As String, right As String) As Integer
static member Compare : string * string -> int
public: static int Compare(System::String ^ left, System::String ^ right);

Docs.summary: Compares two strings according to the Unicode rules for case-insensitive identifier comparison (lower-case mapping).
Docs.returns: -1 if < , 1 if > , 0 if they are equal.
Docs.remarks: These are also the rules used for VB identifier comparison.

MemberSignature.Value: public static StringComparer Comparer { get; }
.property class System.StringComparer Comparer
Public Shared ReadOnly Property Comparer As StringComparer
member this.Comparer : StringComparer
public: static property StringComparer ^ Comparer { StringComparer ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns a StringComparer that compares strings according to Unicode rules for case-insensitive identifier comparison (lower-case mapping).
Docs.remarks: These are also the rules used for VB identifier comparison.

Docs.summary: Determines if two strings are equal according to Unicode rules for case-insensitive identifier comparison (lower-case mapping).
Docs.returns: true if the identifiers should be considered the same.
Docs.remarks: These are also the rules used for VB identifier comparison.

Docs.param: identifier to get the hash code for
Docs.summary: Gets a case-insensitive hash code for Unicode identifiers.
Docs.returns: The hash code for the given identifier
Docs.remarks: These are also the rules used for VB identifier comparison.

public: static char ToLower(char c);

Docs.summary: ToLower implements the Unicode lowercase mapping as described in ftp://ftp.unicode.org/Public/UNIDATA/UnicodeData.txt. VB uses these mappings for case-insensitive comparison.
Docs.returns: If is upper case, then this returns its Unicode lower case equivalent. Otherwise, is returned unmodified.

Docs.summary: Convert a string to lower case per Unicode

Docs.summary: In-place convert string in StringBuilder to lower case per Unicode rules
